Language Model

Language model is to calculate the probability of a sentence consisting of words.

I followed the tutorial text generation online and trained a model to generate words

The dataset I used is from the series of books A Song of Ice and Fire I -- V which the TV show Game of Thrones was filmed on

Neural Model For Text Generation

In total, I used 100,000 to train a generation model, in which 50 previous words are used to predict the following one word.

Text generation example

The input is 20 words and the output is the generated 50 words
